dk.itu.smds.android.bluetweet
Class AbstractBlueTweetService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      dk.itu.smds.android.bluetweet.AbstractBlueTweetService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlueTweetService, BlueTweetService, BlueTweetService
public abstract class AbstractBlueTweetService
extends Service
implements java.lang.Runnable

Base service class for the BlueTweet service. Provides a common skeleton for the service.
Your task is to fill the abstract methods in a subclass.

Author:
frza

loadLatestsHash

public java.util.Set<TweetHash> loadLatestsHash(java.lang.String remoteDevice,
                                                long since)
Load the latest hash to be transmitted to a remote device.
The hash does not include the one of the remote device and hash older than the since parameter.
Suppose the DB contains the following rows:
timestamp device
5A
3B
7C
6D
calling this method with parameters C and 4 will returns the set
timestamp device
5A
6D
since the device C is not considered, and the last B hash is older than 4.

Parameters:
remoteDevice - the connected device to which send the hash
since - a reference timestamp minus the remote age time
Returns:

bulkLoadTweets

public java.util.List<Tweet> bulkLoadTweets(java.util.Set<TweetHash> receivedHash,
                                            long since)
Load the tweets sent by devices that are not in the set of the received hash, and are newer that the since parameter.

You want to call this method after you received and synchronized hash with a remote device.

Parameters:
receivedHash -
since -
Returns:

loadTweets

public java.util.List<Tweet> loadTweets(TweetHash hash,
                                        long since)
Load the updates relatives to the passed hash. Note that is the last timestamp is older than the since parameter, then only the updates newer than the since parameter will be returned.

Parameters:
hash -
since -
Returns:

loadTweets

public java.util.List<Tweet> loadTweets(java.util.Set<TweetHash> hash,
                                        long since)
Load the updates relatives to the set of passed hash. For each of the hash, if the timestamp is older than the since parameter, then only the updates newer than the since parameter will be returned.

Parameters:
hash -
since -
Returns:
